Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.common.message

Class NetworkMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.common.message.NetworkMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class NetworkMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A NetworkMessage represents the simplest object that flows through the network. It is used to carry different kind of information from a sender (or author) to a recipient. It can encapsulate higher level messages or can be simply used to communicate at the network level.
    See Also:
    MessageType, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • author

        private final java.lang.String author
        The name of the NetworkMessage author.

      • type

        private final MessageType type
        The type this NetworkMessage is associated with.

      • content

        private final java.lang.Object content
        The optional content of a NetworkMessage. Can be anything from a service information used at a low level, to a more complex high level packet encapsulated to be carried between different top level entities.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkMessage

        private NetworkMessage​(java.lang.String author,
                       MessageType type,
                       java.lang.Object content)
        This is the only constructor. It create a new NetworkMessage from the given arguments: - an author always required for a message sent from a client to the server; it can be null if the message is sent from the server, as because a server is a unique entity and does not need to have a unique indicator - a type represented by the MessageType enumeration, to be distinguishable depending on his purpose. - an optional content that can contain anything is desirable tobe carried over the network.
        Parameters:
        author - the author of the NetworkMessage.
        type - the type of NetworkMessage, expressed through MessageType.
        content - the content of the NetworkMessage.

    • Method Detail

      • simpleClientMessage

        public static NetworkMessage simpleClientMessage​(java.lang.String author,
                                                 MessageType type)
        Creates a simple NetworkMessage without content. This kind of NetworkMessage should only be used to send information from a client to the server as because an author identifier is needed.
        Parameters:
        author - the author of the NetworkMessage.
        type - the type of NetworkMessage, expressed through MessageType.
        Returns:
        a new NetworkMessage with the given author and type.

      • simpleServerMessage

        public static NetworkMessage simpleServerMessage​(MessageType type)
        Creates a simple NetworkMessage without content. This kind of NetworkMessage should only be used to send information from the server to one or more clients as because the author identifier is omitted.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of NetworkMessage, expressed through MessageType.
        Returns:
        a new NetworkMessage with the given type.

      • completeClientMessage

        public static NetworkMessage completeClientMessage​(java.lang.String author,
                                                   MessageType type,
                                                   java.lang.Object content)
        Creates a complete NetworkMessage which also include a content. This kind of NetworkMessage should only be used to send information from a client to the server as because an author identifier is needed.
        Parameters:
        author - the author of the NetworkMessage.
        type - the type of NetworkMessage, expressed through MessageType.
        content - the content of the NetworkMessage.
        Returns:
        a new NetworkMessage with the given author, type and content.

      • completeServerMessage

        public static NetworkMessage completeServerMessage​(MessageType type,
                                                   java.lang.Object content)
        Creates a complete NetworkMessage which also include a content. This kind of NetworkMessage should only be used to send information from the server to one or more clients as because the author identifier is omitted.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of NetworkMessage, expressed through MessageType.
        content - the content of the NetworkMessage.
        Returns:
        a new NetworkMessage with the given type and content.

      • getContent

        Returns:
        the NetworkMessage content.
